pkgmetadata.longdescription: Technical Data Sets by 'Ruijter et al.' (2013) // The real-time quantitative polymerase chain reaction ('PCR') technical data sets by 'Ruijter et al.' (2013) doi:10.1016/j.ymeth.2012.08.011: (i) the four-point 10-fold dilution series; (ii) 380 replicates; and (iii) the 'competimer' data set. These three data sets can be used to benchmark 'qPCR' methods. Original data set is available at https://medischebiologie.nl/wp- content/uploads/2019/02/qpcrdatamethods.zip. This package fixes incorrect annotations in the original data sets.
